name: The Shadow of Angel Spring
description:
Contain the darkness haunting Angel Spring. Explore the abandoned western town and light your  way forward. But beware... the creature in the shadows awaits  you. 

Design: Filippo Casola, Bailey Sabin

Programming: Dan Paul

VFX: Michael Falcone (@MichaelgFalcone)

Art: Nathan Anderson (@SlorpNoodle), Emily Blane (@blaneemily2), Nadia Simonsen (@murkybokuto), Rachel Cassandro (@rachelcassandro)
